hero.title: lukkari
hero.subtitle: A functional, customizable, and fast alternative schedule viewer for Turku University of Applied Sciences students. Free and ad-free.
hero.disclaimer:
This is an unofficial application and is not approved or supported by Turku UAS.
Data is based on the official Lukkarikone iCal service.

colorful.title: Colorful
colorful.description: The site's color scheme can be customized to your liking in the settings. Multiple presets available. You can also customize the course colors to your taste.

fast.title: Unnecessarily Fast
fast.description: The application does not require login or user accounts. Schedule pages switch lightning-fast without unnecessary loading.

manageable.title: Manageable
manageable.description: You can hide individual lectures or courses from view according to your needs.

comparison.title: Honest Comparison
comparison.subtitle: lukkari.juh.fi is based on the Lukkarikone iCal service, which must be accessed through the official lukkarikone.

development.title: Development
development.description: Suggest and participate. lukkari.juh.fi is an open-source project you can contribute to via GitHub. If you're interested in development and have free time, comment or create issues on GitHub.
